    • Constructor Detail

      • ActCoordinatorImpl

        public ActCoordinatorImpl(DtLogin n)
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Instantiates a new server side actor of type coordinator.
        Parameters:
        n - The username of the actor, this is of type DtLogin. It is used in identifying the correct actor when working with their Class type (CtCoordinator)
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if the server is offline
